title: Equipment Maintenance Lapse: Shift Handoff Gap

dlr.decision: Pull 3 monitors from service; emergency calibration; add two-step verification to S-BIO-001
dlr.decided_by: Director of Biomedical Engineering + CICU Nurse Manager

alternatives_rejected.description: Keep monitors in service pending morning calibration
alternatives_rejected.rejection_reason: One monitor already produced false-negative suppression; unacceptable clinical risk

rs.primary_reasoning: Immediate removal eliminates clinical risk; two-step verification prevents recurrence at process level
counter_claims: Night charge nurse noted monitor shortage during census surge — addressed with portable monitors from step-down unit

new_edges: Equipment maintenance complete → independent verification required before return-to-service status
